page.title: 12EASSIE WILDLIFE - ANIMALS
page.content: We have a great variety of wildlife. Red deer are seen in the higher woodlands and occasionally on lower land.We sometimes see them from our classroom windows. Red squirrels are common in the woods around Holemill. We see lots of hares and rabbits in the fields and badgers are known to live in woody places. Foxes are a nuisance in the Denoon area, where there have been many instances this year of new lambs being killed by them. Stoats and weasels abound in the dry- stane dykes and in our area the stoats turn white in wintertime.
